title: Welcome | Possible Minds
content: Welcome | Possible Minds Boost Support Efficiency & Elevate Customer Experience with AI Get instant, 24/7 sales and support from an AI trained on your content. Free up your team. An AI chatbot that deeply understands both your offerings and customer needs. Sales and support rolled into one, available 24/7 Expertly guides users from purchase consideration to post-sale support. Get Started with a Free 7-Day Trial Credit card not required Features Everything You Need for Smarter Support Explore the powerful capabilities that make PossibleMinds Supportbot the ideal AI assistant. Feature Description Build a Knowledge Base, Automatically Connect your website, documents, or PDFs, and our AI will instantly create a comprehensive knowledge base. No manual data entry or tagging needed, saving you time and effort. Get Answers You Can Trust Every answer comes with links to the original source, so your customers and team can easily verify information and build confidence. Support Customers Everywhere Easily add our AI assistant to your website chat using a simple setup. Support for other platforms like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and WhatsApp is coming soon! Speak Your Customers\' Language, Anytime Provide instant support in about 50 languages, around the clock, powered by advanced AI. Personalized & Continuous Conversations Our AI remembers past chats with your visitors (using a cookie or user ID), ensuring smooth and context-aware follow-up interactions. Route Inquiries to the Right Place, Intelligently The AI understands when a conversation needs a human touch. It can automatically send sales leads to your sales team or support tickets to systems like Zendesk or Intercom. Improve Support with Actionable Insights Our dashboard shows you how well the AI is performing, what your customers are asking, and areas where your knowledge base can be improved. Easily update and retrain the AI with a single click. Protect Sensitive Information Easily Set simple rules to prevent the AI from sharing confidential details, like upcoming product plans or specific pricing, without needing any coding. Pay Only For What You Use Start for free and only pay as the AI helps your customers. This way, you don\'t waste money on software you\'re not fully using. Support Chatbot Pricing Chatbot Pro Perfect for businesses looking to provide instant, accurate AI-powered support and integrate with essential tools. $499 /month Build Your Knowledge Base Automatically (Scan up to 100 pages of your content) Get Answers Customers Can Trust (with verifiable sources) Add to Your Website Easily Support in 10 Languages Remember Customer Conversations for personalized follow-ups Track Performance with Key Metrics Dashboard Get Help via Email Support Get Started Chatbot Enterprise The ultimate AI support solution for larger businesses needing extensive capabilities, deep integrations, and dedicated service. Custom Unlimited Automated Knowledge Base (scan all your content) Trustworthy Answers from All Your Approved Content Deploy Anywhere with Website Widget & Full API Access Full Multilingual Support (Communicate in ~50 languages) Personalized Support with User Recognition & History Smartly Route Complex Issues & Integrate with Your CRM Deep Insights & One-Click AI Retraining Protect Sensitive Data with Simple, No-Code Controls Dedicated Support Manager & Priority Assistance Contact Sales What Our Clients Say âPossibleMinds transformed how we handle customer inquiries. Their AI supportbot is efficient, accurate, and has significantly improved our response times.â Danny Rackow VP of operations, Precise Imaging Is Your Business AI-Ready? markdown:
#  Boost Support Efficiency & Elevate Customer Experience with AI 

Get instant, 24/7 sales and support from an AI trained on your content. Free up your team. 

  * An AI chatbot that deeply understands both your offerings and customer needs.
  * Sales and support rolled into one, available 24/7
  * Expertly guides users from purchase consideration to post-sale support.



[ Get Started with a Free 7-Day Trial ](https://api.possibleminds.in/static/control_panel.html)

Credit card not required

## Features

Everything You Need for Smarter Support 

Explore the powerful capabilities that make PossibleMinds Supportbot the ideal AI assistant. 

Feature  |  Description   
---|---  
  
Build a Knowledge Base, Automatically 

| 

Connect your website, documents, or PDFs, and our AI will instantly create a comprehensive knowledge base. No manual data entry or tagging needed, saving you time and effort.  
  
Get Answers You Can Trust 

| 

Every answer comes with links to the original source, so your customers and team can easily verify information and build confidence.  
  
Support Customers Everywhere 

| 

Easily add our AI assistant to your website chat using a simple setup. Support for other platforms like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and WhatsApp is coming soon!  
  
Speak Your Customers\' Language, Anytime 

| 

Provide instant support in about 50 languages, around the clock, powered by advanced AI.  
  
Personalized & Continuous Conversations 

| 

Our AI remembers past chats with your visitors (using a cookie or user ID), ensuring smooth and context-aware follow-up interactions.  
  
Route Inquiries to the Right Place, Intelligently 

| 

The AI understands when a conversation needs a human touch. It can automatically send sales leads to your sales team or support tickets to systems like Zendesk or Intercom.  
  
Improve Support with Actionable Insights 

| 

Our dashboard shows you how well the AI is performing, what your customers are asking, and areas where your knowledge base can be improved. Easily update and retrain the AI with a single click.  
  
Protect Sensitive Information Easily 

| 

Set simple rules to prevent the AI from sharing confidential details, like upcoming product plans or specific pricing, without needing any coding.  
  
Pay Only For What You Use 

| 

Start for free and only pay as the AI helps your customers. This way, you don\'t waste money on software you\'re not fully using.  
  
## Support Chatbot Pricing

### Chatbot Pro

Perfect for businesses looking to provide instant, accurate AI-powered support and integrate with essential tools.

$499 /month

  * Build Your Knowledge Base Automatically (Scan up to 100 pages of your content)
  * Get Answers Customers Can Trust (with verifiable sources)
  * Add to Your Website Easily
  * Support in 10 Languages
  * Remember Customer Conversations for personalized follow-ups
  * Track Performance with Key Metrics Dashboard
  * Get Help via Email Support

[ Get Started ](/contact?tier=chatbot-pro)

### Chatbot Enterprise

The ultimate AI support solution for larger businesses needing extensive capabilities, deep integrations, and dedicated service.

Custom

  * Unlimited Automated Knowledge Base (scan all your content)
  * Trustworthy Answers from All Your Approved Content
  * Deploy Anywhere with Website Widget & Full API Access
  * Full Multilingual Support (Communicate in ~50 languages)
  * Personalized Support with User Recognition & History
  * Smartly Route Complex Issues & Integrate with Your CRM
  * Deep Insights & One-Click AI Retraining
  * Protect Sensitive Data with Simple, No-Code Controls
  * Dedicated Support Manager & Priority Assistance

[ Contact Sales ](/contact?tier=chatbot-enterprise)

## What Our Clients Say

> âPossibleMinds transformed how we handle customer inquiries. Their AI supportbot is efficient, accurate, and has significantly improved our response times.â 

Danny Rackow

VP of operations, Precise Imaging

##  Is Your Business AI-Ready? 

Take our free 1-minute audit to assess your readiness for AI integration and receive a personalized readiness score. 

[ Take the Audit ](/agent-readiness-audit) Explore Services
